content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=117.5, y=-30.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=117.5, y=-30.5), boiler(position x=111.5, y=-32.0) and offshore pump(position x=107.5, y=-33.5) connected by pipes.

### Copper plate mine at no position
No copper plate mine has been set up yet.

### Copper cable factory at no position
No copper cable factory has been set up yet.

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when placing entities too far away
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to place an entity before placing it.
### Errors when placing entities in occupied tiles
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it.
### Errors when crafting items with missing sub-ingredients
- Make sure you have all the required sub-ingredients in your inventory before attempting to craft an item.
### Errors when connecting entities with pipes
- Ensure you have the required item (pipe) in your inventory before attempting to connect entities.
### Errors when placing small electric poles
- Ensure you have gathered the required raw resource (wood) before attempting to craft a small electric pole.
### Errors when placing entities with existing objects in the way
- Clear the area of any existing objects before attempting to place an entity.

### NAMESPACE
- No utility functions have been defined by the agent yet.
- Important variables:
  - `transport-belt`: 8
  - `pipe`: 3
  - `coal`: 26
  - `iron-ore`: 10
  - `copper-ore`: 10
  - `iron-plate`: 7
  - `copper-plate`: 5
  - `copper-cable`: 2
  - `iron-gear-wheel`: 2
  - `small-electric-pole`: 2
  - `wood`: 7
